articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Someone bought the domain ‘OGOpenAI’ and redirected it to a Chinese AI lab - TechCrunch
articles.description: A software engineer bought the website OGOpenAI.com and implemented a redirect to the website for the Chinese AI lab DeepSeek.
articles.content:
A software engineer has bought the website “OGOpenAI.com” and redirected it to DeepSeek, a Chinese AI lab that’s been making waves in the open source AI world lately.

articles.title: Ozempic and Wegovy: Scientists Uncover New Risks of Popular Weight-Loss “Miracle Drugs” - SciTechDaily
articles.description: GLP-1 medications linked to a lower risk of dementia and addiction but higher risk of kidney, pancreatic, and gastrointestinal issues. Demand for weight-loss medications, including popular brands like Ozempic and Wegovy, continues to rise. A recent study reve…
articles.content: GLP-1RA drugs like Ozempic offer significant health benefits, including weight loss, improved brain health, and reduced addiction risks, but also pose risks like pancreatitis and kidney issues. Resea… [+6141 chars]
